name: Dungeon Adventure (itch) (Anna)
description:
Game developed with Unity for the Multi-platform Project Class of the Games & Apps Development Degree.
Universidade Europeia - Portugal

Description

Dungeon Adventure is a first-person, single player, 3D adventure game. 

Upon arriving in an undiscovered dungeon, the player is tasked to collect artifacts and treasure chests. While exploring, they will face threats such as patrolling enemies, hazards and locked doors for which the player must find the keys. The goal is to get out of the dungeon alive!

Controls
  • WASD to move the character
  • Mouse to control the character

In any case of doubt, the instruction pdf has further information about gameplay mechanics and cheat codes. 

Credits

Anna Cardoso

Yueme Diogo
